html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-03452018-03-26,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectLocally Engaged Employees of the Canadian Embassy and Consulates in the United States Remission Order
PrecisLOCALLY ENGAGED EMPLOYEES OF THE CANADIAN EMBASSY AND CONSULATES IN THE UNITED STATES Remission Order in order to relieve double taxation, to the extent that it arises, with respect to the tax liability of Canadian citizens who are locally engaged at the Canadian embassy in Washington D.C. or at a Canadian consular office in the United States on account of United States state-level income tax paid in addition to the ‘additional tax’ that is payable in Canada, with respect to taxation years commencing on or after January 1, 2017.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2018-0030 Publication Date: 2018-04-18
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Locally Engaged Employees of the Canadian Embassy and Consulates in the United States Remission Order
precis: LOCALLY ENGAGED EMPLOYEES OF THE CANADIAN EMBASSY AND CONSULATES IN THE UNITED STATES Remission Order in order to relieve double taxation, to the extent that it arises, with respect to the tax liability of Canadian citizens who are locally engaged at the Canadian embassy in Washington D.C. or at a Canadian consular office in the United States on account of United States state-level income tax paid in addition to the ‘additional tax’ that is payable in Canada, with respect to taxation years commencing on or after January 1, 2017.
